quickpsy fits psychometric functions for several conditions. The package is 
still under construction. 

## Install

You need to install the package devtools, DEoptim, dplyr, ggplot2 and tidyr. 
For example, to install devtools

```R
install.packages('devtools')
```

and then 

```R
devtools::install_github('danilinares/quickpsy', build_vignettes = T)
```

## Example

```R
data(quickpsydat)
fit <- quickpsy(quickpsydat, FASE, RESP,
                between = .(ECC, INTERVAL, obs), B = 100)
plotcurves(fit)
plotpara(fit)
plotthresholds(fit)
```

## Tutorials

```R
browseVignettes('quickpsy')
```
